statements: DELETE FROM fintech_data_retention_policy WHERE client_id = 101 AND account_number = 1001;
DELETE FROM fintech_data_retention_policy WHERE date_of_creation < '2022-01-01' AND data_retention_limit > 365;
DELETE FROM regulatory_guidelines WHERE effective_date < '2022-01-01' AND guideline_id = 3;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount > 500 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_date < '2020-01-01';
DELETE FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0 OR account_type = 'Savings';
